amendment.description: To provide for the notification of certain individuals regarding options for enrollment under Medicare part B.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1779 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1779 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8014) To provide for the notification of certain individuals regarding options for enrollment under Medicare part B.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1779 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Baucus.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1779 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
